member.name: T:Sagittarius.Lib.ScoreType
member.summary:
Indicates the type of scoring used for this score record
Available types are None - represents an uninitialised value Field - Field Shooting score record Target - Target Shooting score record PPC - PPC match score record

member.name: F:Sagittarius.Lib.ScoreType.None
member.summary: represents an uninitialised value

member.name: F:Sagittarius.Lib.ScoreType.Field
member.summary: Field Shooting score record

member.name: F:Sagittarius.Lib.ScoreType.Target
member.summary: Target Shooting score record

member.name: F:Sagittarius.Lib.ScoreType.PPC
member.summary: PPC match score record

member.name: T:Sagittarius.Lib.Score
